text: Andrew Keith Leaf (born 18 January 1962) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Huby & Magnet. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from York Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Andy Leaf
